amendment.description: To increase the penalties for violations by television and radio broadcasters of the prohibitions against transmission of obscene, indecent, and profane language.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3235 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3235 proposed by Senator Brownback. (consideration: CR 6/18/2004 S6980-6981; text: CR 6/18/2004 S6980) To increase the penalties for violations by television and radio broadcasters of the prohibitions against transmission of obscene, indecent, and profane language.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3235 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3235 proposed by Senator Brownback.
